Title: The Tyrant
Plot: When a controversial African politician falls ill, he is brought to Princeton Plainsboro for treatment. The team struggles with whether to help a merciless dictator being subpoenaed for crimes against humanity in his country. Meanwhile, Wilson tries to make peace with a feuding neighbor, but House?s prying exacerbates the problem.
GuestStars: James Earl Jones, Roger Aaron Brown, David Marciano
